meanings.definition: The act of endorsing or supporting something.
meanings.sent1: Her indorsement of the charity event helped raise funds for the local shelter.
meanings.sent2: The politician's indorsement of the new policy gained public approval.
meanings.sent3: The indorsement of the school play by the principal brought in a large audience.
meanings.sent4: His indorsement of the team's efforts was like a beacon of encouragement.
meanings.sent5: The indorsement of the environmental cause was heartfelt and genuine.

meanings.definition: The signature on the back of a check to authorize its payment.
meanings.sent1: Please remember to sign your indorsement on the back of the check before depositing it.
meanings.sent2: The bank teller verified the indorsement before processing the payment.
meanings.sent3: His messy indorsement on the check made it difficult for the bank to accept.
meanings.sent4: The indorsement on the check was like a seal of approval for the transaction.
meanings.sent5: Her elegant indorsement on the check showed attention to detail.

meanings.definition: The act of transferring ownership of a negotiable instrument to another party.
meanings.sent1: The indorsement of the property deed was a crucial step in the sale process.
meanings.sent2: Legal documents require proper indorsement to ensure smooth ownership transfer.
meanings.sent3: The indorsement of the car title was completed swiftly by the seller.
meanings.sent4: His indorsement of the contract signified the official transfer of rights.
meanings.sent5: The indorsement of the stock certificate marked the beginning of new ownership.
